data.title: Saif Ali Khan Upcoming Movies 2021, Release Date, Trailer and Budget

saif ali khan new film list

data.meta_description: Saif Ali Khan, along with Rani Mukherjee, will be seen in Bunty Aur Babli 2 which will be released in 2021.
data.text:
Saif Ali Khan needs no introduction. The actor has already made his mark in the history of Bollywood. With multiple blockbuster hits in his bag, Saif Ali Khan has proven from time to time that he is one of the prominent actors of the film industry. Last seen in Taanaji (2020) and Jawaani Jaaneman (2020), Saif was one of the few actors who's film was released on the big screen in 2020 before the covid-19 pandemic hit our lives. And now, Saif is ready to be back on the screen with not only one, but two films.

advertisement

Before we dive into the details of his upcoming films, lets have a look at is last three films.

Saif Ali Khan's last three films

Jawaani Jaaneman (2020): A romantic comedy, Jawaani Jaaneman (2020) was directed by Nitin Kakkar, and starred Sail Ali khan along with Tabu and Alaya Furniturewalla. The film revolves around Jazz, a property broker and party-animal in London, who has to confront a daughter he never knew he had, who is also pregnant. The film received mixed-to-positive reviews, but was not successful on block office, as it only earned Rs. 44.77 crores.

Tanhaji (2020): Before Jawaani Jaaneman, Saif was seen in the blockbuster hit Tanhaji alongside Ajay Devgan and Kajol. The film is set in the 17th century and revolves around Tanaji's attempts to recapture the Kondhana since it passes on to the Mughal emperor Aurangzeb. The film received positive reviews and also grossed Rs. 367 Crores thus becoming the highest-grossing Bollywood film of 2020.

Laal Kaptaan (2019): In 2019, Saif Ali Khan was seen in an epic action-drama film titled, 'Laal Kaptaan'. It features Saif as a bounty hunter called Gossain who goes on a killing spree with the intention of exacting revenge upon a Subedar named Rahmat Khan, who is also being chased by the Marathas. The film was not a hit at the box-office and was received negative-to-average reviews from the critic.

Saif Ali Khan's upcoming movies

Bunty aur Babli 2: We all loved Bunty aur Babli (2005) where Abhishek Bachchan and Rani Mukerji played con-artist partners-in-crime. Bunty aur Babli 2 will be the spiritual sequel of the first one. The film stars Saif Ali Khan, Rani Mukerji, Siddhant Chaturvedi, and Debutante Sharvari Wagh. Innitially the film was scheduled to be relesed on June 26, 2020, however, amid covid-19, the film was postponed for 2021.

Bunty aur Babli 2 release date: 2021.

Director: Varun Sharma

Cast: Saif Ali Khan, Rani Mukerji, Siddhant Chaturvedi, and Sharvari Wagh.

Bhoot Police: With Bunty aur Babli 2, Saif will also be seen in the upcoming horror-comedy Bhoot Police. The film is being directed by Pavan Kirpalani, as as per rumors, the filming is still going on. Saif Ali Khan will share the screen with Arjun Kapoor, Jacqueline Fernandaz, Yami Gautam, and Javed Jaffery. The shooting of the film began in november 2020. We are expecting the film to be out in late 2021.

Bhoot Police release date: 2021 (expected)

Director: Pavan Kirpalani

Cast: Saif Ali Khan, Arjun Kapoor, Jacqueline Fernandaz, Yami Gautam, and Javed Jaffery
